text: Tried last week to place an order online. Says "call store". I wanted to redeem my points so what's the point? Sooooo I ordered Papa John's. Tried again today ...  same issue. Website somehow is down at this location or some sort. I will find another pizza joint to frequent. I literally have no patience for inconsistencies.

name: Jerney
text: My delivery estimation was 21-31 minutes. And hour and a half had gone by. I am super ticked now because I got 1 large pizza and a dessert and the store is closed. text: We get pizza here regularly. We always ask about the current specials. The pizza is good every time. No complaints, we'll be back.

text: Pizza is good as far as pizza goes, however, service is severely lacking! The windows and glass doors are disgustingly filthy. The employees were very pleasant, but they didn't have the order we called in ready. They claimed nobody called it in, but the person who took the order was the one making the pizza!

name: John Boutwell
text: We've gave this location several chances and have been disappointed every time. The staff is the issue. Inexperienced, young crew that know nothing about service with no apparent leadership. Probably fine for delivery but if you're looking to go out, skip this place.

name: Jeff Tilley
